org.qbroker.net

Class RedisConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.net.RedisConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connector

    public class RedisConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connector
    RedisConnector connects to a Redis server and provides the following methods for Redis operations: rpush, lpop, blpop, publish, subscribe, unsubscribe and nextMessage.

    This is NOT MT-Safe. Therefore, you need to use multiple instances to achieve your MT-Safty goal.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
